; R3 <= DM_Addr
; R4 <= positive #
; R5 <= negative #
; This program will incremement through the addresses in the data memory and 
; if the address is a multiple of 2, it will store the address # otherwise 
; it will store the negative address #
SUB R3, R3, R3
SUB R4, R4, R4
SUB R5, R5, R5
SUB R7, R7, R7
ADD R7,R7, 2
CMP R3, 127
BEQ #28
ADD R4, R4, 1
SUB R5, R5, 1
AND R6, R3, 1
ADD R7, R7, #-1
CMP R7, 0
STRMI R4, [R3], #0
ADD R3, R3, 1
B #-44
B #-8


-------
E0433003
E0444004
E0455005
E0477007
E2877002
E353007F
0A000007
E2844001
E2455001
E2036001
E2477001
E3570000
44834000
E2833001
EAFFFFF5
EAFFFFFE
